name: Bomber Man V1.0
description:
★★★★★★★★ KEYS ★★★★★★★★

Use the Arrow Keys to move, SPACE to drop a bomb. Don't get caught in the explosion!!! Try to be the last man standing. Some power-ups allow you to kick or punch a bomb by walking into it.

★★★★★★★★ POWER-UPS ★★★★★★★★

Flame - Extend blast range by +1

Bomb - Drop extra bombs +1

Rollerskate - Run faster

Boxing Glove - Run into a bomb to punch it into the air

Kicking Boot - Run into a bomb to kick it across the ground

Mega Flame - Extend blast range to maximum

Line Bomb - Press Space twice to drop all your bombs in a line

★★★★★★★★ INFO ★★★★★★★★

I have always enjoyed the Bomberman games, and thought this would make a fun multiplayer game to play on scratch.

★★★★★★★★ CREDITS ★★★★★★★★

All graphics and sounds are taken from the various Bomberman Games. Scripts are by me (gameryashu)
